entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Malahat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:57 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Malahat 09:00 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers this morning. Wind light except north 30 km/h gusting to 50 near Haro Strait late this morning and this afternoon. Temperature steady near 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023
